00003 #include <iostream.h>
00004 
00005 
00006 #include "RoboticPlatform.hpp"
00007 #include "ObjectManager.hpp"
00008 #include "Puma560.hpp"
00009   
00010   
00011   
00012 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00013 {
00014     RoboticPlatform::init(argc, argv);
00015     RoboticPlatform::setExitOnlyWhenAllWindowsClosedOn();
00016     
00017     OpenArchitectureManipulator::setAutoEnableArmPowerOff();
00018     
00019     ObjectManager om;
00020     Manipulator *manipulator;
00021 
00022     CmdLineArgs *commandLine = RoboticPlatform::getCommandLineArguments();  
00023     if (commandLine->isOption("m"))
00024     {
00025         manipulator = om.createDerivedObject<Manipulator>(
00026             commandLine->getStringOption("m"));
00027     }
00028     else
00029         manipulator = om.createDerivedObject<Manipulator>();
00030     
00031     if (om.d_status.isStatusError())
00032     {
00033         cout << om.d_status.getMessageText() << endl;
00034         return -1;
00035     }
00036     
00037     manipulator->setSimulationModeOff();
00038     manipulator->createControlPanel();
00039     
00040     while(1)
00041     {
00042         delay(1);
00043     }
00044 
00045     return 0;
00046 }
